original_title: My Fantastic Pag-ibig: Fairy Tail Romance
overview: Meet Lentis (Alex Diaz), a mermaid who returns to shore to see her beloved earthling Nep (Yasser Marta). If he asks to have legs to get to know the young man better, will fate give it to him?
title: My Fantastic Pag-ibig: Fairy Tail Romance
